original: 董卓廢少帝，立劉協為獻帝，不久就弒害少帝及何太后，專斷朝政，大封州牧，各地諸侯軍閥擁兵為重，群雄爭鹿。
text: Dong Zhuo abolished the young emperor and made Liu Xie the emperor. Soon he killed the young emperor and the empress dowager, arbitrarily dictating the state and animal husbandry, and the warlords of various vassals supported their troops and fought for deer.
